personalInfo.name: Tarun Singh
personalInfo.title: frontend Developer
personalInfo.bio: Crafting sleek and user-centric solutions with passion for innovation and collaboration. The journey of any aspiring developer starts with a single step.

Quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs.
Success is not about how fast you finish writing code, but how well you understand the problem.
Programming is not just about typing code; it's about thinking logically and solving problems creatively.
Like building a house, coding requires a strong foundation of logic and structure.
In coding, as in life, mistakes are inevitable. What matters is how you learn from them and improve.
The beauty of coding lies not only in its functionality but also in its elegance and simplicity.
Coding teaches us patience and perseverance, as we strive to turn ideas into reality one line at a time.
Just as every story has a beginning, middle, and end, every code has its own logic, process, and outcome.
Coding is like a puzzle; it challenges us to think critically and creatively to find the best solution.
Coding is not about being perfect; it's about making progress and continuously learning along the way.
